page.title: 17The Future
page.content: 5R's fourth years have had their ideas for the future.We think transport will change, because petroleum is declining. We also think computers will take over jobs,and in the process bring a rise in unemployment & waves of crime,vandalism & possibly a civil war.Nuclear weapons will also change a few said they would rise and the rest either didn't know or thought they would decline.Food could change and be bought in packets.The population will grow maybe merging towns & cities.Wildlife will die because of polution & the squeeze of cities.Man will live on the moon & under the water.medicines will change and give a stop to main diseases. If there is no future you will not be reading this!!!!!
